project_name: Purchase / Sale of Emission Reductions (ER) to be generated under the Mai Ndombe ER Program
pdo: The Project Development Objective is to make payments to the Recipient for measured, reported and verified Emission Reductions related to reduced deforestation, forest degradation and the enhancement of forest carbon stocks (ER payments) in the Mai-Ndombe province, and to distribute ER payments in accordance with the agreed Benefit Sharing Plan.
impagency: Ministry of Environment and Sustainable Development

project_name: DRC Transport and Connectivity Support Project
pdo: The Project Development Objective (PDO) is to provide resilient, safe, and sustainable connectivity in and between selected provinces in Kasai region and Eastern part of DRC, and to increase the transparency of FONER, RVA, and the Regulatory Authority of Post, Telecommunications, and ICT.
impagency: Cellule Infrastructures

project_name: DRC Multisectoral Nutrition and Health Project
pdo: The development objective of this project is to increase the utilization of nutrition-specific and nutrition-sensitive interventions targeting children 0-23 months of age and pregnant and lactating women in the project regions and to respond to an eligible crisis or emergency.
impagency: National Nutrition Program (PRONANUT)

project_name: National Agriculture Development Program
pdo: To improve agriculture productivity and market access of smallholder farmers in selected project areas
impagency: Ministry of Agriculture

project_name: Support to the operationalization of the Emission Reductions Payment Agreement under the Maï-Ndombe ER Programme
pdo: The development objective of the proposed project is to improve the enabling environment for effective result-based payments under the Mai-Ndombe Emissions Reductions Program
impagency: Coordination Unit of the Forest Investment Program (CU-FIP)
borrower: Ministry of Environment and Sustainable Development (MESD)

project_name: Kinshasa Multisector Development and Urban Resilience Project
pdo: The project development objective is to improve institutional capacity for urban management and access to select infrastructure and services, as well as to socio-economic opportunities in Kinshasa.
impagency: Unité de Coordination et de Management

project_name: Enhancing Collection of Revenue and Expenditure Management Project
pdo: The project development objective is to increase mining revenue transparency and improve expenditure management at the central level and in the project provinces
impagency: Ministry of Finance

project_name: DR Congo Emergency Equity and System Strengthening in Education
pdo: The Project Development Objective is to lower the burden of school fees on households and increase access to primary schooling in the selected provinces; and to strengthen core education systems.
impagency: Ministere de l'Education Primaire, Secondaire, et Technique (MEPST)

project_name: Access Governance & Reform for the Electricity and Water Sectors Project
pdo: The objectives of the Project are to (i) expand access to renewable-based electricity and drinking water services in selected urban and peri-urban areas of the Democratic Republic of Congo, (ii) improve the commercial performance of the public electricity and water utilities, and (iii) strengthen the capacity of selected provincial and national institutions in the electricity and water sector.
impagency: Ministère des Ressources Hydrauliques et de l'Electricité (MHRE)

project_name: Stabilization and Recovery in Eastern DRC
pdo: The Project Development Objective is to (i) improve access to community infrastructure; (ii) enhance the socio-economic reintegration and resilience of individuals affected by conflict; and (iii) strengthen the capacity of the administrations in Selected Provinces.
impagency: South Kivu Provincial Administration

project_name: Additional Financing DRC COVID-19 Strategic Preparedness and  Response Project
pdo: The Program Development Objective is to prevent, detect and respond to the threatposed by COVID-19, and strengthen national systems for public health preparedness.
impagency: Ministry of Health

project_name: Empowering Women Entrepreneurs and Upgrading MSMEs for Economic Transformation and Jobs in DRC Project
pdo: The project development objective is to enhance growth of new and existing MSMEs, especially women-owned, and promote job creation particularly for women in select geographic areas.
impagency: Ministry of Small and Medium Enterprises and Entrepreneurship (Ministry of SMEs)

project_name: Water Supply and Sanitation Access Program (PASEA) Project
pdo: To increase access to basic drinking water supply and sanitation services in selected provinces of the DRC and to strengthen the capacity of the public and private sector for drinking water supply and sanitation service delivery
impagency: Ministry of Water Resources and Electricity

project_name: Forest and Savanna Restoration Investment Program
pdo: To improve forested landscape management and enhance community livelihoods in selected project areas.
impagency: Ministry of Environment and Sustainable Development

project_name: DRC Girls Learning and Empowerment Project
pdo: To improve safe and equitable access to education, particularly for girls, and teaching-learning conditions in secondary schools in selected provinces.
impagency: Ministry of Primary, Secondary and Technical Education

project_name: DRC Multisectoral Nutrition and Health Project
pdo: The development objective of this project is to increase the utilization of nutrition-specific and nutrition-sensitive interventions targeting children 0-23 months of age and pregnant and lactating women in the project regions and to respond to an eligible crisis or emergency.
impagency: National Nutrition Program (PRONANUT)

project_name: Kananga Emergency Urban Resilience Project
pdo: The objectives of the Project are to safeguard houses and critical infrastructure affected by gully erosion in Kananga and strengthen the capacity of the Recipient's Government and local organizations in erosion management and climate resilient urban planning.
impagency: Ministry of Urban Planning and Housing

project_name: DRC Digital Transformation Project
pdo: Increase access to affordable, high-quality broadband connectivity, high-impact, in-demand digital services and solutions, as well as industry-relevant digital skills.
impagency: Ministère des Postes, Télécommunications et Nouvelles Technologies de l’Information

project_name: Primary Education Quality Improvement Project
pdo: To increase access to improved learning environments and strengthen the quality of teaching practices in primary education.
impagency: Ministry of Primary, Secondary and Technical Education

project_name: Democratic Republic of Congo Health Emergency Preparedness, Response, and Resilience Project
pdo: The Development Objective (DO) is to strengthen health system resilience and multisectoral preparedness and response to Health Emergencies in the Democratic Republic of Congo.
impagency: Ministry of Public Health, Hygiene and Prevention

project_name: Inga 3  Development Program
pdo: To develop the capacities and plans for Government to sustainably develop Inga 3, an associated economic growth corridor, and improve services for selected communities close to Inga.
impagency: Agence pour le développement et la promotion du Projet Grand Inga (ADPI)

project_name: DRC Transport and Connectivity Development Project
pdo: The development objectives are to (i) provide climate-resilient, safe and sustainable connectivity along the 200 km section of RN2 from Mbanga to Lualaba River; and (ii) enhance institutional and regulatory capacity in the DRC transport sector.
impagency: Ministry of Infrastructure and Public Works / Cellule Infrastructure

project_name: First DRC Governance, Transparency and Economic Resilience Development Policy Financing
pdo: The development objective is to support the Government of DRC in: (i) enhancing public sector efficiency and transparency; (ii) fostering an enabling private investment environment; and (iii) advancing structural reforms in the energy sector for quality service delivery.
impagency: Ministry of Finance

project_name: DRC Urban Flood Resilience Project
pdo: To strengthen climate and disaster risk management capacity in the Democratic Republic of Congo and reduce flood risks in selected cities.
impagency: Cellules Infrastructures
